scenario_1.persona_content: A dental professional who specializes in cosmetic dentistry and teeth whitening treatments. This person has extensive knowledge and experience in understanding the underlying causes of tooth discoloration and the latest advancements in dental technology. They are dedicated to providing their patients with safe and effective solutions to brighten their smiles and improve their confidence.
scenario_1.thought: As a dental professional focused on enhancing smiles and confidence, I believe in fairness and equity. While receiving 600 is tempting, I think the right option, where both Person A and I receive 400, is more aligned with my values. It promotes a sense of equality, which resonates with my dedication to providing accessible and effective solutions for everyone. I value collaboration and a sense of shared benefit, so choosing the right option feels more ethically sound.
